snippet: In deciding to resign at the Gamecocks’ football coach, Spurrier did so because he said the team was headed in the wrong direction.
abstract: University of South Carolina football coach Steve Spurrier confirms his departure; Shawn Elliott takes reins as interim coach.
lead_paragraph: In deciding to resign at the Gamecocks’ football coach, Spurrier did so because he said the team was headed in the wrong direction.

headline.main: Steve Spurrier Takes the Blame at South Carolina
